title: Gautam Adani To Inaugurate Centre Of Excellence In AI In Baramati On Sunday
description: Adani Enterprises Chairman Gautam Adani will inaugurate the Sharad Pawar Centre of Excellence in Artificial Intelligence in Baramati, Pune district. The centre, established under Vidya Pratishthan, is funded by the Adani Group. Key attendees include NCP (SP) head Sharad Pawar, Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar, Baramati MP Supriya Sule, and Rajya Sabha MP Sunetra Pawar. This inauguration marks a continuation of the long-standing partnership between Adani and Pawar, dating back nearly two decades.
content:
Adani Enterprises Chairman Gautam Adani will inaugurate the Sharad Pawar Centre of Excellence in Artificial Intelligence in Baramati, Pune district on Sunday, marking a significant milestone in educational infrastructure development in the region.
